Europe PMC

Europe PubMed Central (Europe PMC) is an archive of life sciences journal literature. PMC Europe tracks the citations for a given publication.

ALM Name pmceurope
ALM Configuration default
ALM Core Attributes count
ALM Other Attributes none
Protocol REST
Format JSON
Rate-limiting unknown
Authentication no
Restriction by IP Address no
API URL http://www.ebi.ac.uk/europepmc/webservices/rest/MED/PMID/citations/1/json

Example

{
  "version": "3.0.1",
  "hitCount": 23,
  "request": {
    "id": "17183631",
    "source": "MED",
    "page": 1
  },
